feed.title: AppFlowy Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for AppFlowy: v0.6.2
entry.content:
Release Notes

Version 0.6.2 - 07/01/2024

New Features

  • Duplicate a Space.
  • Move a page from one space to another.
  • Undo markdown formatting with Ctrl / Cmd + Z.
  • Revamped the UI of the Shortcuts tab in Settings.
  • Close AppFlowy on macOS, and the application remains in the Dock bar.

Bug Fixes

  • Fixed an issue where it was unable to zoom in with Ctrl / Cmd and + on some keyboards.
  • Fixed an issue where nested lists could not be pasted into existing lists.
  • Fixed an issue where typing inside inline code broke the format.
  • Fixed the position of the maximized app when restarting.
  • Fixed a UI issue that caused the inability to view select/multi-select values on mobile.

entry.title: New release for AppFlowy: v0.6.3
entry.content:
Release Notes

Version 0.6.3 - 07/08/2024

New Features

  • Publish an AppFlowy document as a website / Share as a web page

entry.title: New release for AppFlowy: v0.6.4
entry.content:
Release Notes

Version 0.6.4 - 07/16/2024

New Features

  • Integrated the AppFlowy Editor into AppFlowy AI Chat.
  • Enabled customization of the document cursor color and selection color in Settings.

Bug Fixes

  • Optimized the performance for loading recent pages.
  • Fixed an issue where the cursor would jump randomly when typing in the document title on mobile.

entry.title: New release for AppFlowy: v0.6.5
entry.content:
Release Notes

Version 0.6.5 - 24/07/2024

New Features

  • Share your database as a web page.
  • Select certain views to be published to protect internal-only columns or views.

entry.title: New release for AppFlowy: v0.6.6
entry.content:
Release Notes

Version 0.6.6 - 07/30/2024

New Features

  • Upgrade your workspace to unlock unlimited storage, more members, and unlimited AI responses.
  • Introduce a new block: Image gallery.
  • Support drag and drop images into documents.

Bug Fixes

  • Fix minor UI issues on Desktop and Mobile.
